channel.title: Projects on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joost Plattel

item.title: ical2roam
item.description: A small little web-application that lets you import iCal exports to Roam Research

item.title: Obsidian Clipper
item.description: This is an unofficial clipper for Obsidian that allows you to easily clip a selection to a note in Obsidian. More information can be found on Github or in this blogpost.

item.title: Brouwerij Nooitgedacht
item.description: Brouwerij Nooitgedacht is our brewery that I run together with friends.

item.title: Organization.supply
item.description: An inventory management tool build with Python & Django

item.title: EHBA.app
item.description: Eerste hulp bij abonnementen offers a data-based recommendations train travel subscriptions.

item.title: Ambassador for the Digital Society School Amsterdam
item.description: In 2018 - 2020 I am one of the ambassadors for the Digital Society School located in Amsterdam

item.title: Sous-vide Rice Cooker
item.description: I modified my rice-cooker so I can use it as a sous-vide apparatus.

item.title: DIY Longboard
item.description: I created my own longboard from scratch (with a Mondrian pattern on the back).

item.title: De Padvinders
item.description: My first real project that got a bit out of hand and developed in a business while I was a student. Together with 4 other friends I helped people with working smarter on their computer, basically doing as Seth Godin said: Go find a geek. Someone who understands Gmail, Outlook, and other basic tools. Pay him to sit next to you for an hour and watch you work. Then say, ‘tell me five ways I can save an hour a day.

item.title: Mondriaantje
item.description: Input your name and get your own personalized Mondrian!

item.title: Berichtenbox Forwarder
item.description: A small utility that enables automagic fetching of messages of our government.

item.title: Quantified Self community
item.description: I co-founded the QS Amsterdam group & started the QS Conference in Europe.

item.title: The Curious Corner of the Internet
item.description: A (almost) monthly newsletter stocked with the stuff I find on the corners of the internet!

item.title: Qount.us
item.description: How can we use personal data to improve the way we do our work? Qount.us was a dashboard collecting personal data with a goal to increase insights that might boost the quality of life surrounding work.
